values:
They got the murderer!..YAY!...no more damn questions about that creepy guy that was sittin in my yard at 10pm bothering me..hes now bein charged for murder of 16 yr. old girl across the street. He's been living here for 8 months and he slits the throat of the girl across the street. And im allowed to go home w/out bein in "danger" . YAY! Him and his friend robbed their house and he wanted to go back to grab something else the next day and she was home w/out him knowing. I feel so bad for the family and we put flowers and talked to the mother, shes so upset..my mom started to cry.  and the ppl in charge of the investgation were nice and bothered me w/ questions about what he said to me but i didnt mind. they were getting their point across w/out scarying me.."we recommend that u stay somewhere else for the next few days b/cz we're currently holding him but we cannot hold him for a long period of time w/out pressing offical charges and we cant press charges until we're sure..but there is no doubt in my mind..he did it."...and i was so happy when he called and said "we have held him for the max. amount of time and must release him but new info has come in and we got him. His friends(2) are goin down for burglery charges and hes goin down for murder and burg. We found the weapon and all the evidence we need against him. We sry to inconvince u in anyway and we're happy that no one else was hurt. Just keep an eye out for anybody around the neighborhood, anyone u dont reconize and call if anything happens, even if minor. But thank -you for u coroporation and we'll call u if we need any more info from you."....im so happy that its over for the most part. the camera crews are gone..a few come every now and then but its not as much and the yellow tape everywhere is gone.

 so if a 21yr old guy sits in ur yard at night and starts talkin to u when u pull up in the garage and says hes ur new neighbor and becomes very curious in u and offers u drinks...stay away..like me,  b/cz as the officer said u can never really kno / trust someone even ur neighbors...ppl can surprise u.  .........and i think that family will be moving out soon....that must be hard to look at the neighborhood, that house, and the family knowing ur son / brother killed that girl and ruined their lives over an item he wanted to steal. u kinda have to feel bad for the family...espically the parents..b/cz they now know, they have failed at the most important thing in their lives, raising their son...............*liz*

Hey ya'll!...i kno i havent written in awhile but ive been so busy b/cz of this pageant thing. It took a lot of work buying the perfect everything but it was so much fun and paid off b/cz im the 2004 Miss Grayslake first runner-up. And considering i havent done many pageants before it was nice to win something and this year should be so much fun..sitting in corvettes, in parades, waving to ppl..lol, but thank-you so much mia and manda for all ur help and support!...i g2g for now tho...*pounds chest, peace*(hehe, mia) *liz*

Tomorrow: Interview w/ pageant judges
Saturday:..the big day!..lol *crosses fingers*
*pounds chest, peace*..lol( mia )....*liz*
"To be yourself in a world that is constantly trying to make you something else is the greatest accomplishment." ~ Ralph Waldo Emerson

This weekend has been so busy!....from shopping for the pageant this weekend and thank-you so much ty and churra for helping!...u guys have no idea how much this means to me. Then I also had the Poms Carwash..that was fun...standing out front sayin "help support Varsity Poms" - NOT "grayslake poms"..lol..then there was that guy who asked mia and me to personally wash his car..lol...then that same day I had to work for a few hours, it wasnt that bad...wait to I tell ya'll the story about me getting hit on by some guy that was there shopping w/ his mom...lol..then today i had to go in for 2 hours for a Mandatory meeting bout LP stuff :(....but I g2g for now...talk to ya'll later *urs truely,liz* pounds chest,peace*..lol(ty)
   "To think is easy. To act is hard. But the hardest thing in the world is to act in accordance with your thinking."~ Goethe

WhAt Do U dO wHeN yOu HaVe LaYed It AlL oUt On ThE TaBlE bUt ThEy STILL DoN't SeEm To EvEn CaRe At AlL??....YoU HaVe DoNe EvErYtHiNg PoSsIbLe aNd HaVe SaId EvErYtHiNg PoSsIbLe BuT u CaN't SeEm To GeT iT ThRoUgH ThEiR hEaD??..WhAt Do ThEy Do InStEaD? Go OuT WiTh ThEiR OtHeR fRiEnDs A fEw DaYs LaTeR lIkE nOtHiNg HaS eVeN HaPpEnEd. BuT tHeY sAiD tHey HaVe ThOuGhT aBoUt It BuT rEaLlY ThEy HaVeN't. I'm NoT sTuPiD aNd U cAn'T wAlK oVeR mE oR tHiS IsSuE...If YoU dOn'T cArE, eItHeR Do I...aNd ThIs ChApTeR WiLl CLOSE!*uRs TuReLy, LiZ*

When a friend is in trouble, don't annoy him by asking if there is anything you can do. Think up something appropriate and do it.  ~ Edgar Watson Howe

Why do people overreact to the stupidest things?...take my mom ridulous mother...i was at mia's w/ amanda, keri, and cassie..just talking and stuff and she calls and demands I be home "NOW"<-quote my mom. so i figured it was b/cz she needed me to go w/ her to go get her car from the dodge AGAIN( for the 5th time,b/cz they say the power windows are fixed but they NEVER are) or my uncle is in the hospital,maybe he was not doin any better, so kari rushed me home ( and thank-you so much for that keri) and the real reason she made me come home.....
             she thought we were doin drugs and drinking!...she made me open my mouth and do all the stupid ass tests and then, of course, i passed but dont worry, if u thought i was gonna be victorous at this one...umm...no..come on, u kno my mom...she brought up everything i did in the PAST to throw it in my face...omg...thats so lame!i g2g for...ttul later <mia call me> *urs truely,liz*

"The reasonable man adapts himself to the world; the unreasonable one persists in trying to adapt the world to himself. Therefore all progress depends on the unreasonable man." ~ George Bernard Shaw
HeY, ok...so ChUrRa convinced me to open one..lol...i have no idea how to use this!...lol *urs truely,liz*
